text: is a Japanese manga artist. Her main works are Sayuri-san no Imouto wa Tenshi, Tsuki ga Kirei desu ne and Goshujinsama to Kemonomimi no Shoujo Mel. She started her career in 2007. At that time, she was drawing Doujinshi of Moomin, Nintendo, and others. She started drawing Yuri in 2013. Her work, Sayuri-san no Imouto wa Tenshi was serialized from 2014 to 2016, Tsuki ga Kirei desu ne was serialized from 2015 to 2019, and Goshujinsama to Kemonomimi no Shoujo Mel was serialized from 2016 to 2018. == Works == === Series === * Gouhou Yuri Fuufu Bon (Legally Married Yuri Couple) (2014-2016) * Sayuri-san no Imouto wa Tenshi (An angel who had swooped down was my little sister) (2014-2016) * Okujou no Yurirei-san Side A: Mou Hitotsu no Yuritopia (Kindred Spirits on the Roof) (2015) * Tsuki ga Kirei desu ne (Isn't the moon beautiful?) (2015-2019) * Goshujinsama to Kemonomimi no Shoujo Mel (My master & furry-eared girl Mel) (2016-2018) === Short stories === * Usagi no Belle to Ōkami-san (Belle the Rabbit and the Wolf) (2016) * Otona no Hatsukoi (First Grown-up Love) (2019) * Hidari no Ashikase (The Left Leg Shackle) (2019) * Inari no Kekkon (Inari's Marriage) (2019) == References == ==Other websites== * Hatishiro - Hachi Itō Web Site * * Hachi Itō on pixiv Category:Living people Category:Japanese manga artists Category:Japanese writers Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Hachi Itō
